General.Name: Wisesoft Co Ltd
General.Description: Wisesoft Co., Ltd. operates aviation-related business primarily focus on air traffic control in China. It provides civil aviation traffic control products and services, which includes air traffic control automation systems, multi-channel digital synchronous recorders, radar simulators, tower vision simulators, etc.; and flight simulator training for on-the-job pilots of airline companies. The company also offers military aviation control; and combat simulation training products and services. In addition, it provides artificial intelligence hard core technology comprising aviation-specific voice recognition technology and product-related services, such as automatic voice interaction system for airborne avionics based on automatic monitoring system for air traffic control command and safety. Further, the company offers 3D face camera and recognition for public safety and anti-terrorism, national security, military and military systems, and high-end security application. Wisesoft Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Chengdu, China.
General.Address: No. 7, Wuke East 1st Road, Chengdu, China

9.Name: Ms. Jun Jie  Wu
